textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: No place for a casual swim...

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Shark Reef is the home of the nastiest, toughest sharks\n in the ocean. Can you help them clean up their act?\n

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT
 In dangerous waters, it's sometimes better to let the
 smaller fish come to you. It takes patience, but you
 don't want to take too many chances out here!
